programme.title: Lee Marvin property suit
programme.short_synopsis: Film star Lee Marvin sued by ex-partner.
programme.medium_synopsis: Film star Lee Marvin sued by ex-partner citing California property rights.
programme.long_synopsis:
Film star Lee Marvin sued by ex-partner citing California property rights.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
